subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Yankees were thumped by the Blue Jays after learning earlier in the day that Teixeira, who was leading the team with 31 home runs and 79 runs batted in, had a cracked bone in his shin.
snippet: The Yankees were thumped by the Blue Jays after learning earlier in the day that Teixeira, who was leading the team with 31 home runs and 79 runs batted in, had a cracked bone in his shin.
